sentences:
Igor Yuriyevich Nikulin (; born August 14 , 1960 in Moscow , Russian SFSR ) is a former hammer thrower who represented the USSR , the Unified Team , and later Russia .
He won the bronze medal at the 1992 Olympic Games in Barcelona , Spain .
One of the most remarkable performances in all of hammer throwing is Igor Nikulin 's U23 world record of 83.54 m set 1982 - 09 - 02 in Athína , which then was good enough to put him 2nd in the world through all time behind Sergey Litvinov on 83.98 m.
His personal best of 84.48 m was set on July 12 , 1990 in Lausanne currently putting him 7th through all time .
Nikulin 's father Yury finished fourth at the men 's hammer throw at the 1964 Summer Olympics .
